title: The terms and conditions for resettlement of such existing tenements shall be as governed by the Maharashtra Slum Areas (Improvement, Clearance and Redevelopment) Act, 1971
clause_text: The terms and conditions for resettlement of such existing tenements shall be as governed by the Maharashtra Slum Areas (Improvement, Clearance and Redevelopment) Act, 1971.
